attributes.comment:
Regarding the proposed fee increase by the U.S. Citizenship and Immigration
Services, docket number(USCIS-2006-0044):

The proposed fee increases by the USCIS raise fees by up to 66% for
adoption-related petitions. The fee increases specifically for N-600 (which may
have to be applied for / paid for twice with the waiting times required in
international adoptions) and N-565 are especially harsh. For the N-600, if a
family has to apply twice, for one adoption, due to the waiting times as is
common, that is $920 alone! We are currently in the process of an
international adoption and the fees related to this are already exhorbitant.

Perhaps making international adoption related petitions exempt from the fee
increases, as proposed for those with T nonimmigrant status, would be a more
acceptable compromise.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Sarah Gimbel
